11.content:
It was a dark and stormy night....

Actually, it was dark but NOT stormy. In the dead of night, nothing moved in the land of Hyrule. Hardly anything moved on the Hyrule Field, where stray monsters still roam. A horse running broke the silence. The horse did have a rider on its back, all clad in a white dress. Before the horse got to Lon Lon Ranch, the rider dismounted from the horse.

Princess Zelda smiled as she held out the Giant's mask in front of her. It had been stolen by Ruto. But Zelda needed it. She needed its powers. She always wanted to be a giantess, crushing and munching everything in her path. And now, she had the mask to do it!

Zelda chanted some magic words to activate the mask. The mask began to glow and Zelda started to grow! She didn't stop growing until she was 100 feet tall.

She brought her hand to her mouth and lapped up the water noisily like a dog, and felt it pour down her throat and into her belly where it mixed with the remains of her meal. She reached down for another handful of water and found a blue tektite trapped in her palm. She swallowed it as if it were a pill along with the water. She decided that it would take to long to drink the lake one handful at at time, so Zelda headed over to Kakariko village, pulled the long shaft of the well out of the ground, then used it as a straw to drink the rest of the lake. While drinking the water in the lake, Zelda swallowed several more Tektites, ate the old man in the lakeside observatory, and belched out the gas from her new snacks. After Zelda finished with the lake, she went back to Hyrule field to lay down. She rubbed her full tummy and felt that her bladder too was full; she would have to pee soon. Zelda was frustrated by the escape of her rival, Princess Ruto, and decided to take it out on her trapped people gathered in Zora Fountain. The unarmed and helpless Zora screamed and begged for their lives, but Zelda ignored them as she leaned in close with her enormous face and began to drink the water from the fountain, as if it were a regular drinking fountain.

The hundreds of Zora men, women, and children used their swimming abilities as best they could to try to escape, but they were no match for the powerful suction force of thousands of gallons of water being sucked rapidly into Zelda's thirst lips and down her throat. Zelda found the water very cool and refreshing, and she closed her eyes as she drank and drank the freshest purest water that could be found anywhere in all of Hyrule. As she drank, she felt countless Zora slid down her throat where they landed with a splash in her stomach.

Zelda didn't stop until the entire fountain had been sucked completely dry, and there was nothing but a deep dry crater where the water had been. Zelda let out an enormous belch that echoed throughout the now uninhabited Zora domain. The entire Zora people (except Ruto and the royal family) were trapped in her bulging belly. Most of the Zora were actually still alive, because they could breathe under water and Zelda's belly was full of it.

The huge amount of water inside Zelda's belly swished around loudly with every step she took, and Zelda could feel the thousands of tiny Zora swimming around in there like tiny goldfish in a bowl. They were safe for the time being, and would be as long as there was water in there to protect them from Zelda's stomach acid...

112211.content:
Ganondorf flailed about hopelessly, splattered with Zelda's excrement. He wailed in fear and anguish.

Zelda smiled devilishly. "Ha. Not so confident now, are we? Will we just finish this off...?"

Ganondorf's wailing now became howling: "NO, PRINCESS ZELDA! PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE..."

"Ooohh," Zelda feigned pity. "It's too bad, Ganondorf. I would have let you go if you hadn't made fun of my belches, which I'm quite proud of, as a matter of fact..."

Ganondorf tried to apologise profusely as he tried to clamber to his feet. But Zelda would have none of it.

"Oh? You're sorry?" she mocked. "You like my burps now? Why don't you have a taste of one?"

With power only a giantess could muster up, she smashed down the walls and reached into the castle's larder, grabbing a giant handful of onions. As she crammed them into her mouth and began crunching away, Ganondorf began to whimper hopelessly."Princess, I---"

"Shut up," Zelda ordered, between munches. Her rancid onion breath wafted over and choked Ganondorf. He was still coughing and spluttering when Zelda took hold oh him with her enormous giantess hand and raised him to her mouth. He was tiny compared to her. Smiling devilishly, she opened her mouth and sighed contentedly after her filling onion feast, and the stench of onion blew Ganondorf's fragile mind apart.

"No..." he whimpered, no, no, no, no..."

But he was too late. A deep rumbling had began in Zelda's gut. She knew it was coming; he knew it was coming. He braced himself, but nothing could prepare him for what was about to happen.

Zelda unleashed the juiciest, raunchiest, chunky onion belch ever heard, directly into Ganondorf's face. The sound reverbertaed throughout the hall, and echoed throughout Hyrule. Zelda giggled... "Oops! must have been something I ate."

And with that, she proceeded to chomp Ganondorf up, piece by piece, chunk by chunk. And when she was done, she sat down, contented, and sighed. She tilted to the side only to let rip a monstrous fart, which she proceeded to sniff. Pleased by the smell of her own gas, she smiled, and decided what to do next...

Figuring that she had better explain what was going on, Peach continued. "Yeah, Toadsworth heard that Bowser was planning to kidnap me again so he wouldn't let me go, so I snuck out and found a mega mushroom. Then I got hungry." She continued to smile innocently like it was no big deal that she had just devoured the entire populations of two towns, including the Mario brothers.

"And what exactly did you eat to make your belly so big?" Daisy asked nervously, even though she was fairly certain she knew what the answer was.

As if the noise wasn't bad enough, Daisy now felt her world shift with every movement Peach made. Fearing that she might fall out of the huge navel, Daisy thrust both hands into one of the folds right at the back of it and grabbed as tightly as she could. As soon as she did, though, she felt her world bounce up and down and heard Peach's voice above her. The huge princess was giggling, which in turn was causing her belly to jiggle slightly.

Suddenly, the bouncing stopped briefly, only to return much more violently. The cries inside Peach's belly turned into screams. As Daisy was thrown about inside Peach's navel, her grip weakened until she could hold on no more. Upon letting go, Daisy found herself being tossed about towards the edge, where the bouncing seemed to be even more violent. Moments later, she tumbled out of the giant belly button, but instead of landing on the ground, she landed not far below on the roof of a building that Peach hadn't gotten around to destroying. From there, she could see what the cause of all the turbulence was. Peach had grabbed her belly with both hands and was shaking it up and down. A short while after seeing Daisy sitting on the roof of the building, she lifted her belly up as high as it would go and then let go. Daisy saw the enormous belly jiggle for a few seconds.

"Well, I guess my belly really is that big if it jiggles that much," Peach said, still smiling about the whole ordeal. Daisy tried to say something but after all the movement that had just happened, she could only utter gibberish. Peach looked at the much smaller princess and wondered what to do with her. She could eat her just like she had eaten all the other villagers, but she was still feeling quite full. Besides, Daisy was a friend. Sure, she had eaten Mario and Luigi earlier, but they literally jumped down her throat. She hadn't intended to eat them. And then she got an idea.

"Say, if we find another mega mushroom," Peach said to Daisy, "you could eat it and become a giant just like me, and then we can have that picnic! Except instead of the usual picnic food, you could eat whole towns' worth of people! It'll be great!" Daisy's jaw dropped when she heard the idea. Could she really do this? Surely it was wrong to kill so many innocent people just for a thrill and a full belly. On the other hand, Peach seemed to be treating it as no big deal, so maybe it really was no big deal. Besides, what would the alternative be?

Suddenly he was pulled deeper and deeper down Tira's throat as she gulped again. It was like trying to swallow a very large piece of meat. But eventually she succeeded. Outside, Tira moaned happily as she rubbed her trim belly. Not so much as a single bulge appeared, it was still as firm and trim as ever. Suddenly Tira opened her mouth and let out a loud *BRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPP!* Tira took a breath, and laughed, patting her belly again. "Whew...excuse me *urp.*" Tira said. She knew digestion was taking its' place. Kilik's body would dissolve into her stomach, and his soul would be transferred into the jewel in her hand.

That was one soul down, many more to go.

1452222222212121.content:
Surveying the shattered remains of what had once been the tower, Raine - still adjusting to her new height - deliberated over what she ought to do. She was a little confused; even frightened. What was it that a giantess should do?

This question was answered when a deep rumbling began to resonate in her gut, echoing across the continent. That was what she needed: food.

To begin with, she was unsure where a giantess should go to grab a bite to eat. The old human food was hardly going to satisfy her churning giantess stomach. However, again, her questions were answered when a desire began to build up inside her, entirely outwith her control. She couldn't understand it at first, but she soon realised that her new body was telling her that she was to eat not human food, but human beings themselves.

She had no idea why she suddenly felt this way, but the craving became so overwhelming that she had no choice but to give in.

But where to start?

This was one question she could easily answer herself...

"Genis". That brat.

With giant steps, she stomped off home, causing earthquakes with each step. When she reached her house, the townspeople all crowded round to get a glimpse of her. They were uniformly terrified. She became somewhat frightened herself. Sure, they couldn't do her much harm if they decided to attack her, but she didn't want to risk it. She didn't know how to get rid of them

But then an idea flashed through her mind. A devilish grin spread across her face. She knew what to do.

Turning right round, she began to lower her enormous ass towards the ground. Its curvaceous shadow spread across the town as she lowered it. Then, with an almighty thud, she squashed every villager flat with her enormous ass. Their screams of horror were silenced as they were utterly flattened. In order to make sure they were finished off, she shuffled a little, squishing them entirely.

But it wasn't over yet. Another devilish grin spread across her face as she realised what was coming.

A tremendous, deep, juicy fart rumbled out from underneath her. Its volume was enormous; its tone deepened and richened by the fact that she was sitting as it happened. A final, blood-curdling scream could be heard from underneath her, but it was muffled. That last villager had been finished off by Raine's incredible fart.

Raine laughed a full, hearty, womanly laugh. "Well, ex-CUSE me!" she cackled. "It must have been something I ate", she added, as an extra little fart squeezed out.

A moment later, little Genis' head poked out of the window of their house. He must have been awoken by Raine's earth-shattering fart. He was trembling with fear.

"Raine...?" he trembled. "What... happened...?"

Raine had no desire to stretch this out. "My dear little brother," she said, "I'm sorry, but... well, let's keep this short. I'm hungry, and I'm going to eat you. Is that quite alright?"

Without waiting for an answer, Raine grabbed ahold of her brother and chucked him into her gaping maw. She chomped him up, savouring the taste and not feeling particularly upset at all about the fact she was eating her only family. With a mighty gulp, she downed him into her stomach.

"Aaaahhh...", she sighed blissfully, her hunger abating, "that's better... but... ohhhhhh..."

There was a pressure building in her stomach, but she relieved it with an almighty belch, which sent Genis' saliva-coated staff splattering out of her mouth. She giggled... "ooohhh, looks like you gave me some pretty bad gas, Genis."

And indeed he had. Raine began belching, and she just couldn't stop. These belches were no dainty, ladylike burps, either; they were the real thing: juicy, chunky, deep, bassy, rumbling, meaty... "and they just feel soooo good," Raine moaned with pleasure as she let out a particularly juicy one.
1452222222212121.title: Raine eats her brother...and belches and farts.

151.content:
It was yet another day in Hyrule. Link, now the Hero of Time, was currently cleaning his Master Sword. He was whistling tunelessly. He was in Kakari Village. He usually hanged out here quite often. Even though he wasn't a child of the forest, he enjoyed to visit where he was raised as a child. Link had made himself a new bed, and he was sitting on it.
"Hero of Time" giggled the voice of Saria. "I have a surprise for you"
Link sighed and took a look out of his treehouse. There was Saria, along with the other 6 sages. Zelda was smiling and waved. Nabooru and Ruto was quietly speaking to each other.
Link climbed down the ladder.
"What are you all doing here?" asked Link.
"To visit" said Zelda.
"And....to do this!" yelled Saria, pointing a finger at Link. Suddenly, Link started to shrink! He stopped shrinking when he was about 3 inches tall!
"What have you done with me?!" asked Link.
"Shrunk you" said Zelda. "then we gonna eat you right up!"
"What?" asked Link.
"You'd better run" said Zelda.

choices: go to the left towards the sleeping quarters
go to the right towards the kitchen
15522222221.content:
Fox went up to the door and shouted out,"This is Fox, requesting door lock release, pass code Alpha 17798."
The door opened to a massive coridor, which was a long walk at normal size had become an entire metal city,an eternity of walking. In annoyance, Fox began to move, in spite of the vast expanse, hoping he could find someone, anyone that could help him out, or at least find the kitchen to pack as much rations as possible for he probably wouldn't survive without sustanance.
He made it to the end of the hallway after fifteen minutes of walking, he came to the four way coridor. the left lead to the other's sleeping quarters and the right lead to the kitchen. Knowing this he had two options...
15522222221.title: It opened to an empty hall

155222222212.content:
"I'll last longer if I get some food first."thought Fox as he turned into the right coridor. "This is ironic" thought Fox happily, "we're low on supplies but now that I'm small, I have enough food to last me for months." This prospect gave him inspration to quicken the pace,"If everyone aboard is as small as me, then I can split the food evenly and we can live happily, or at least until we go back to normal."
After thirty minutes he finally made it into the kitchen, with the motherload of food ready gor the taking. He prepared to gather as much food as possible when...
155222222212.title: go to the right towards the kitchen

1552222222121.content:
Fox turned to behold his friends entering the room, Peppy,Slippy, and one he'd thought he wouldn't see. "Falco, man am I glade to see you!" Falco smirked the same cocky grin he used to make when he was on the team.
"Well I thought I'd stop by and see how you guys were live'n without ol' Falco run'n things." Fox laughed to Falco's old jokes, just like he used to. "So when did you come in?" "Oh late last night, and I was so tired, I slept in my Arwing." "Well I'm glad to see you, but it's clear to all of us that we're in a situation, first we need to get some food and then we need to find Krystal." "I agree, so let's get started by finding some containers." replied Peppy rubbing his hands together to circulate his old hands.
But before they got started, a sound was coming from the hall, the sound of feet coming in their direction, it sounded like...
1552222222121.title: The others come, also shrunk

choices: We need to get to a high spot.(Falco
15522222221211.content: As the sound grew close, it became obvious to all that it was the sound of an organic's feet, meaning only one explanation, Krystal was coming and she was at regular size. Fox turned to his team,"Alright Krystal is the only one unfazed by the shrinking, it's imparative that we get her attention, any idea?
15522222221211.title: krystal's feet

155222222212111.content:
Peppy interjected,"What are you thinking, we don't know her that well, and more importantly, we don't know her motives, for all we know she might have been the one to do this to us in the first place!" Fox sighed, "We haven't got much choice but to take that risk, we can't stay this way forever you know."
Peppy got furious, "Damn it Fox, you're being a fool, what would your father say about this!" Hearing this, Fox was outraged. " Just where the hell do you get off telling me what I should or should'nt do, YOU'RE NOT MY DAD!"
When Fox looked back at Peppy, he was silent, in fact all three men were silent, their eyes were wide with what seemed to be fear. It took a moment and then Fox realized that they were not alone, he could sense being stared at, he had an idea of what it was...but he was afraid of looking behind him to stare at who he was certain was staring back at him, finally he found the courage, turning his head slowly, he saw...
155222222212111.title: No Fox, that's suicide!(Peppy)

choices: Wait, I can change you back to normal
Mmm, I think you'll make a delicious snack
1552222222121111.content:
With his head fully turned, the terror eveyone else felt jolted into him as well, staring into his eyes and what felt like into his very soul was Krystal, a giantess,no...a goddess looked at all of them in complete curiousity.
"Fox,Falco, my are you all small." None dared to reply, one false word may end up to be their demise.
"This is rather amusing, but now what shall I do with you?"
1552222222121111.title: Krystal's face

15522222221211112.content: A mishivous laugh came out of her lips, which was already a given for trouble, and then her tounge moved across her mouth, a true sign that her intentions was focused toward their destruction."I haven't had breakfast yet, and you four make the perfect choice."The adreneline pulsed through Fox, it was now or never fight or flight
15522222221211112.title: Mmm, I think you'll make a delicious snack

choices: swallow me, and I'll make you suffer
Try and chew me, I'll blast your teeth to peaces
155222222212111121.content: Fox just then remebered his pistol was still in his holster along with a grenade, and not a moment too soon, Krystal pounced Fox first,grabbed him in her paw and lifted him toward her mouth. Krystal's mouth began to water,"You know Fox, I really did love you, and I still do, so now I am letting you choose your death,would you rather be swallowed whole or do you want me to chew you up and get this whole thing over with?
155222222212111121.title: Find a weapon and fight

choices: grabbed the grenade and thown it down her throat
uses the pistol to shoot her uvula
1552222222121111211.content:
Fox looked down into her mouth, studying for any weak points, then he looked into the vixen's ravenous eyes. "Alright, I've got a little fight left in me, so go ahead and swallow me." Krystal, looked at Fox and said something he had not expected,"You're brave Fox, I must say you are taking a hard path but I know you won't die without a fight and for that I commend you."
The look in her eyes had changed drastically,as if she meant every single word, full of pride for such brave prey, the sight was the stragest thing he had ever seen and finally she lowered him to her mouth her lips were approaching, sensing the end he got himself ready, but instead of popping him inside, she kissed him!
Although shocked from this action, he recovered his bearings and got ready as she pulled him away from her lips and looked into her eyes again, this time they seemed almost sad.
"Fox, I know you have weapons." "Damn her telepathy, now I'm really going to die!" thought Fox.
But Krystal slightly smiled, "take them with you, and I hope you get out alive."
"Fox held tight to his weapons as he was lifted again over her mouth and then she dropped him down into her maw. As he fell, he could feel her breath growing more hot and moist until he landed on her tounge.
Now he was sliding fast toward her throat, her uvula coming more and more closer, it was now time to act out his next coure of action so he...
1552222222121111211.title: swallow me, and I'll make you suffer

choices: He hit the ground and broke some bones
15522222221211112111.content:
Fox thought fast, he had to make this count, or he would end up as carbs, supporting her body. He didnt have time to choose, so he grabbed the grenade, acivated the dead man's switch and threw it into her throat. His feet was nearing into her throat when he heard a wet splat with an addition of blood. Her mouth opened tilting downward releasing Fox.
The attack was a success, however a new problem presented itself, he was in a free fall toward the ground, and with nothing to grab hold of he continued to fall until...
15522222221211112111.title: grabbed the grenade and thown it down her throat

choices: Yes, we got power in all systems!
Damn, nothing, hope you've gotta idea Fox!
155222222212111121111.content:
All of a sudden an Arwing which was also at small scale hovered under Fox, he landed into what was a two seated Arwing, a custom made model for Falco. "Need a lift?" Falco asked sacastically as usual. "Yeah now let's get the hell out of her!"
The ship flew towards the observation deck, but as they made the approach, the systems went offline!
And worse, instead of falling it was flying backwards, towards Krystal! "Oh shit, now you've done pissed her off, great going Fox!" Fox looked back to see her, and she was definately angry. "Now you have done it, I hope you have a bloody good prayer." The telepathic message sealed their doom.
Fox knew even if it were slim, they might have a chance to stop her. "Falco, can you re-activate the Arwing's flight and weapon systems?" "Alright, cross your finger and hope this works." Falco opened the wiring systems and tried to hot wire it' "Last two wires, ready?" Fox nodded.
When the wires came to gether falco looked back at Fox and said...
155222222212111121111.title: He was saved by Falco

choices: We put these wings into overdrive!
We make a hit and run!
1552222222121111211111.content:
"Power, Fox we've got power!" The ship's systems came online and the engines roared to life. "Great now get us out of here quick!" exclaimed Fox, pointing out Krystal's open jaws just meters away." Falco gladly fired the propusion draw to maximum, breaking them free from Krystal's telepathic hold.
Just as they got to saftey, the communication relay beeped, Falco pressed the button and Peppy came onscreen. "Falco, Fox, great to see you boys alright!" "Where are you guys?" asked Fox.
"Slippy and I are in the obsrvation deck, we found ROB broken, wires all over the place, Slippy is making repairs."
"Good to know, so what do we do now." "Well I want you two to.......dec......RO....atta....stal....." "Peppy were losing conection." By then the speaker was filled with static, and to make matters worse, the ship stopped again. "Damn, this is bullshit, so what the hell do we do now!" yelled Falco who was now pounding on the controls. " Falco I have an idea, but it's risky." "I sure hope so, cuz I'm no good at sweet talk'n the ladies, especially one that have me on the menu!" Fox nodded, "Ok here's the plan....
1552222222121111211111.title: Yes, we got power in all systems!

choices: Flies through the door and into the observation deck!
Jumps out as the ship crashes into the door!
15522222221211112111111.content:
"Let's try and route all power to the booster engines." Falco's eye opened wider. "Are you nuts, the ship'll be ripped to peices!" "What part of risky didn't you get?" Falco looked back to see that they were almost to her mouth, her hot breath was fogging the windows. "Ok, hang on!" Falco tapped on a pannel of the Arwing and the display showed blue light at the engine part of the figure, then just as they entered into her now closing maw, they saw through the fog covered window, light. The fog cleared to reveal that they were going at maximum velocity, but as they contined, the ship's display pannel showed red at where the engine was. The left wing began to vibrate until it finally broke. The ship was now spinning towards the observation deck's door which was now closing.
"Crap, we're gonna die!" yelled Falco as the ship.....
15522222221211112111111.title: We put these wings into overdrive!

155222222212111121111111.content:
With the door opening growing more narrow by the second and an enraged blue vixen in pursuit, death seemed certian. "We arn't gonna make it!" cried Falco in complete dispair. "No we can make it, look if we make a 90 degree pitch we can go through as the door closes." Falco learned in spite of his elite flight expertise that when Fox says something will work, it was a sure bet that he would be right. "Ok" said Falco, "No tuning back!" He sceamed as he made the pitch sideways and at full speed thrusted his way through the door, the walls came closing between them coming down to just inches.
The twin pods were now beginning to get crushed, which was soon to stop the ship as the rest of the door crushed was crushed, along with it's two passanges. And so he let out a scream as the ship began to spark, until finally it came out.
With the ship severly damaged, it fell toward the ground, crash landing a few feet away from the door. And when it came to a complete stop they busted open the cockpit window and walked outside to find the deck in ruins, computers were broken, seats shreaded, and a giant ROB was out of commision. They walked a few feet to find Peppy unconcious. "Peppy, C'mon wake up old man." cried Falco.
"Uhh....Fox....Falco, She destroyed everything." "But she wasn't in her, how!" asked Fox. Peppy sighed. Look around, you ought to have already know how she did this." They helped the old hare to his feet. "We've gotta stop that broad!" said Falco. "No, right now she's too powerful, and in the state we're in now, killing us would be childs play to her, we've got hide and formulate some kind of a plan."
No sooner was his speech over, a loud sound emanated through the room it was....
155222222212111121111111.title: Flies through the door and into the observation...

1552222222121111211111111.content:
The servos in ROB had finally come to life. "Query:What just happened, the last recorded images I recollect was... Oh my... the ship is falling apart....I'm not ready to be decomissoned....." "ROB get a hold of yourself, you get broken for two hours and you wine like a baby." The voice came from what seemed to be ROB's head.
"Alright Slip get down here!" shouted Peppy. "Query: Peppy, Slippy...I can detect your voices but your visual scan is negative, where is your location?" Peppy shouted at the giant machine,"ROB, look down!" ROB looked down to find a small lifeform no more than an inch high. "Command: magnify by twenty percent." He found out that the lifeform resembled Peppy.
"Statement: Lifeform identified as Peppy....Determining next course of action....
1552222222121111211111111.title: ROB reactivating....

choices: Suggestion: Perhaps my aid can be require to keep you "off the menu"
Query: How would the mistress like you served, dead or alive?
15522222221211112111111111.content:
"Identity confirmed as Peppy Hare...Other Entities....Fox Mcloud, Slippy Frog,Falco Lombardi...Beginning aiding sequence...Query: Am I malfunctioning or is my optical sensors showing your scale as one inch?"
Slippy replied,"Alright to make a long story short, Krystal got bored, shrank us, and now she has Kitsune Udon with a side of frog legs on the menu." Fortunate for all of them, part of ROB's programing allowed him to interpret sarcasm. He then replied...
15522222221211112111111111.title: Aid Peppy and group

choices: Statement: Yes I can bring you back to your original hight
Statement: Negative, I can only change the size of Non-organic entities
155222222212111121111111111.content: "Query: First she's your team member and second, If she consumes Fox, isn't that the act of species cannibalisim? Statement: I have awakened into a universe of madness." Falco wasn't a man for patience, and frankly, the tin can was beginning to annoy him, so finally he yelled "Will ya shut up already, we need ya help, so listen closly, can you unshrink us so we can fight this crazy bitch!
155222222212111121111111111.title: Suggestion: Perhaps my aid can be require to ke...

1552222222121111211111111112.content:
ROB gave what was a robotic version of a sigh. "Statement: I cannot change a live organic, the result of this is high radiation, disintegration, and re-materealizing as primodial substance." "Well I gess that answers your question." Falco enraged was about to punch Fox when a pounding sound came from the door, large dents were forming on the door, Kyrstal was trying to break the only thing between her and the four little snacks behind it!
"ROB, if you can't fix us, can you at least give us some weapons?" asked Fox, hoping at least they could have some way to defend themselves. "Statment: Affirmative, sending in two Arwings, One Landmaster, One personal sheild pack, one belt of grenades, and two blaster pistols."
At that moment, a blinding flash filled the room. when the light dimmed, all the weapons that were descibe were there. "C'mon, we don't have much time!" shouted Exclaimed Fox as the door which was dented began to have holes, and through those holes was seen a vixen filled with ravenous hunger that only they could fill.
"I call dibs on the Arwing!" shouted Falco as he jumped in. Fox looked over at Peppy who was at the other Awing. "Sorry Fox, but I'm way down the hill to be fighting on the ground." Fox growled as he looked to the Landmaster with slippy on top. "Look, you're more suited for ground combat anyhow, don't worry, she'll be so envolved with us that you can throw the grenades, then we can make the final blow." Fox was greatly annoyed but he grudgingly put on the battle equipment. They were ready, they had to be...becuase Krystal has finally broken down their the door... their last baricade against the Goddess.
1552222222121111211111111112.title: Statement: Negative, I can only change the size...

choices: Jumped into the air and came flying toward them
"Oh what happened, I had the most odd dream."
15522222221211112111111111121.content: Smoke filled the room... the silence filled the room with anticipation, Fox got on the side of the Landmaster, ready to signal the attack. Then through the shroud of obscring smoke came Krystal. She seemed calm, collective, even magestic in her stride with her tail swaying flowinly back and forth. "Has she finally come to her senses?" asked Peppy. She then looked at the small band below her and then she....
15522222221211112111111111121.title: The last stand!

155222222212111121111111111211.content: Jumped toward them, with her hand open to grab them and her jaws open to eat them. The time had come and Fox yelled, Attack, Attack!!"
155222222212111121111111111211.title: Jumped into the air and came flying toward them

1552222222121111211111111112111.content:
The two Arwings began to fire as they flew around her. This was no more than an annoyance to her as she tried to swat them like flies. Slippy took the opprotunity to fire at her legs. She fell to the ground, crying and screaming as she jerked with pain. With her distracted, Fox ran up to her mouth, and threw the Stun grenades into it and down her throat.
It took a few seconds to kick in and she began convulsing until she fell unconcious. The ships landed just in time, becuase they were growing back to their original size.They took time to look around at themselves and then eachother and shouted in celebration.
Then after the gleeful happiness, they all looked back at Krystal who was still unconcious. They looked at eachother, and knowing she could awaken at anytime, they all knew what had to be asked,"What do we do with her now?"
1552222222121111211111111112111.title: Outcome:The team is victorious

15522222221211112111111111121111.content:
All of them knew in their mind that she was too dangerous to stay with them, but at the same time, none of them had the heart to kill her. Then Fox spoke up,"Look, we know what she did to us was unforgivable, but will killing her teach her anything, and more importantly, killing her make us no better than what she is." Tears filled their eyes, Falco took his gun and pointed, but in the end, he just couldn't pull the damn trigger. "Ok, said Falco sobbing, We take her to the athorities, they will know what to do."
So they took her into the brig, put her in restraints and flew to the closest Cornerian allied base. As they were approaching, A voice entered his mind. "Fox, I'm sorry...I was just trying to break the boredom, and I am willing to go quietly, and perhaps we will see eachother again." Fox began fighting back the tears, "It's not going to be the same around her without you, but we can't let you do this to anyone else. Krystal replied,"I will learn, and I promise you, I shall not abuse my powers again."
A couple of guards escorted the restrained vixen to their ship, as she left she looked back at Fox with the same innocent green eye as the door closed.
All that day, they sat around, depressed with the loss of the most beatiful and possibly the most powerful team mate they ever had.
15522222221211112111111111121111.title: Give her to the athorities

155222222212111121111111111211111.content:
A few weeks had passed since then, when they got a message, which meant one thing, work...actual work. They answered the call in complete glee for a job that meant money for the ship, for their food budget, and more importantly, on whatever the hell they wanted. But what they heard disturbed them. "This is prison freighter 221, we are reqesting an S.O.S., we have an escaped prisoner, a vixen with blue hair and green eys, wearing exotic aperral, she has eaten all the guards and prisoners and has an Arwing, I am the only survivor, please stop her Star Fox, or the Lylat system will be consumed!"
Fox plopped down into his chair, shocked,"What have I done, I caused this, Andross didn't imprison her for himself...He was protecting the system from her...I've...I've doomed us all!"
The Great Fox drifted deeper into space, now facing an uncertian future.
155222222212111121111111111211111.title: Conclusion

choices: Story from Krystal's point of view, (first or second story, or both)
1552222222121111211111111112111111.content: Well I hope you all had fun reading this story, and I know some of you were expecting to eat them and end them all, well all hope isn't lost, I have made many opprotunities for you to make Krystal eat our heros, you can also read my alternate ending which will probably be more satisfying, but if you want, I've made a little last part that is entirely up to you to fill in, you can put whatever you want, but let's make this intresting with a challenge:prolong the starfox team in their battle against Krystal. Try to give these guys a fighting chance. Another sugestion I;ve made is to tell the story from Krystal's point of veiw whic should be awsome with whatever ideas pops into your head. And with that...I bid you guys good luck and have fun!
1552222222121111211111111112111111.title: The End?

choices: Remembered the sheild pack and activated it
fell int the acid and was slowly but painlessly digesting
1552222222121111211111111112112.content:
Fox knew their chances were slim but what he saw next horiffied him, the two Arwings stopped in place, a tell tale sign the Krystal was using her psychic powers, but instead of simply swallowing the Arwing whole she ripped off the cockpit window, telekenetically pulled Falco and Peppy from their ships and the two screamed as they flew into her mouth!" Then she began to chew them, screams could be heard for just a few seconds until she finally swallowed them. Slippy zoomed across the floor in the Land Master as he approached her furry feet, she simply smiled and kicked the vehicle like a toy car.
Fox started to run to aid slippy who was now crawling out from the firey wrekage, then he to flew into the air and into her hand. She looked at the frightend amphibian who fist staired at her miscjivous looking eyes and then donw at her mouth with drool and some of the blood that belong to his best friends. She laughed at his tearing fearful eyes and said," Your legs look so delcious, I believe I'll have them rare!" Slippy screamed as she placed he sopping wet tounge under his legs and then she bit into them.
Slippy made a blood curdling scream as she pulled the last of his tendons. She then looked don at him again,"Now dear boy, stop crying, I'm going to be nice enough to swallow the rest of you hole." Slippey sobbed,"No...No, Kill me now, please kill me now.." She place of what remained of him onto her tounge and with her mouth still open, Fox could see the crying Slippy sliding down into her throat. She licked her lips and started looking around,"Now I wonder where Fox ran to?" Fox began to turn around and then he heard her voice in his head."Just how clueless do you think I am, did you think I didn't know where you were?"
Fox turned to see her standing, lookind down at him. If his friend died fighting so wold he, he charged, yelling with his pistol settings on maximum, that was until he found himself literally flying across the room and slamed into a wall. Krystal came, more and more closer, he aimed his pistols but Krystal's telekenesis ripped them from his hands, smasing on the wall and the floor. She had him right in front of her mouth, Fox could feel her hot moist stinking breath gusting on him. He gazed at her eyes and cried, Why, why are you doing this to us!" She replied, It's time to pay your tribute." "What...Whatdo you mean tribute?" yelled Fox.
"You must not know who I really am do you Fox, I am the goddess of war and of death, you have been in my favor, I was the one that got you to Venom safely, I was the one who gave you the power to kill Andross, I even put on the facade of you father. But then I lusted for you, so I put on the act of me being imprisoned so I could be with you, and I find it amusing that I fell in love with a mortal, but not even you can be an exeption, but scince I love you, I will make you digest without pain."
Fox struggled,"C'mon, can't you make an exception just this once?" Krystal looked at him with a sad smile. "If I made an exception for you, I wouln't be fair to everyone else, so please try to understand." "Krystal please!" "I'm sorry Fox, Goodbye."
She opened her mouth wide as her breath winded all over his body until he was dropped into her mouth, and he slid down screaning as he saw the last hint of light fade with her closing jaws, and then he felt her uvula brush his face as he slid into a hot wet tube that was sucking him deeper into darkness. He tried and tried to find a foothold, everything was to smooth and slippery.
Then he felt the tight squeeze around his feet lossening which was a releif at first, then he realized the was about to enter the stomach. And when he fell in he....
1552222222121111211111111112112.title: Outcome:The end of Star Fox

15522222221211112111111111121121.content:
Finally remembered the sheild pack he turned it on, just as he fell in. The energy feild activated, he saw a blue,staticy bubble surround him, giving off a little light as well as keeping the acid out. However, somethings are not to be seen, and what he saw would be a final testament to that, he saw parts of Peppy and Falco, oozing red and white which would have to be their flesh and bones digesting, Fox held in his vomit, that was until he saw Slippy who was still alive! Choking and gaging as blood flowed from his mouth, and his torso partially digested. And to Fox's terror he could hear him grutally strain,"Kill me.Kill me" until he sank deeper into the acid with blood clouding the top.
Fox was seeing first hand the terrors of Hell. Then he heard Kystal,"It's no use hiding in your sheild, you are only delaying the inevitable, it's over Fox, trust me and let go." Fox looked at the meter, only five minutes left until it will evenually burn out, and he would die."
Fox sat at the bottom of the sheild bubble, losing his will to live just as the sheild was losing power. He finally decided to fall asleep, finding a siutable way to die as the stomach's contractons and expansions soothe him hike a lullaby.
15522222221211112111111111121121.title: Remembered the sheild pack and activated it

choices: Krystal can't take it, she needs Fox alive and vommits
Fox survives the digestive tract with the sheild
155222222212111121111111111211211.content:
So is this how we end this story, really C'mon, I think we should find a way to make this story a little longer or a little better, shoud Krystal vomit Fox out of the fact that she's in love. Should Fox's sheild be able to make the journey out. You know and I know that It's senseless to leave a story in a cliff hanger, so lets kick it up a notch and see what happens.
So I leave you all saying good luck and most importantly have fun!
155222222212111121111111111211211.title: Is this the end?
